statements: SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE pollution_level > 5;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM endangered_species WHERE species_category = 'Mammals';
SELECT species_name, pollution_level FROM endangered_species WHERE pollution_level < 3 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM endangered_species WHERE species_name LIKE '%elephant%';
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE species_category = 'Birds' ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM endangered_species WHERE pollution_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE species_category = 'Mammals' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, species_category, pollution_level FROM endangered_species WHERE species_category = 'Birds' AND pollution_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM endangered_species WHERE pollution_level < 3 OR species_category = 'Fish';
SELECT DISTINCT species_category FROM endangered_species ORDER BY species_category DESC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM endangered_species WHERE pollution_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM conservation_groups WHERE location='Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT group_name, location FROM conservation_groups ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM endangered_species;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, pollution_level FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered' AND pollution_level > 5;
SELECT species_id, species_name, conservation_status FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status='Critically Endangered';
SELECT * FROM endangered_species JOIN conservation_groups ON endangered_species.species_id = conservation_groups.group_id WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE pollution_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY species_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE pollution_level > 5;
SELECT group_name, location FROM ConservationGroups WHERE group_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM SpeciesConservation WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered';

SELECT species_name, species_type, group_name, location FROM EndangeredSpecies JOIN SpeciesConservation ON EndangeredSpecies.species_id = SpeciesConservation.species_id JOIN ConservationGroups ON SpeciesConservation.group_id = ConservationGroups.group_id;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE pollution_level > 3
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY species_name DESC

SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies JOIN SpeciesConservation ON EndangeredSpecies.species_id = SpeciesConservation.species_id WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY species_name ASC

SELECT group_name, location, species_name FROM ConservationGroups JOIN SpeciesConservation ON ConservationGroups.group_id = SpeciesConservation.group_id JOIN EndangeredSpecies ON SpeciesConservation.species_id = EndangeredSpecies.species_id

SELECT group_name, COUNT(species_id) AS 'Number of Species' FROM ConservationGroups JOIN SpeciesConservation ON ConservationGroups.group_id = SpeciesConservation.group_id GROUP BY group_name HAVING COUNT(species_id) > 2
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, region FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT source_name, description FROM PollutionSources WHERE location='River';
SELECT * FROM ConservationGroups ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT species_id, source_id, impact_description FROM SpeciesImpact;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE region = 'Asia';
SELECT species_name, region FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT group_name, location, contact_email FROM ConservationGroups WHERE location = 'Africa' ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM PollutionSources WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT species_name, impact_description FROM EndangeredSpecies JOIN SpeciesImpact ON EndangeredSpecies.id = SpeciesImpact.species_id WHERE SpeciesImpact.source_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status='Critically Endangered'
SELECT species_name, pollution_threat FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE pollution_threat='High'
SELECT species_name FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status='Vulnerable' ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT species_name, conservation_status, pollution_threat FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status='Endangered' OR pollution_threat='Medium' ORDER BY conservation_status, pollution_threat
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered';
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE pollution_threat = 'High';
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE species_id > 5 ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' OR pollution_threat = 'High';
SELECT species_name, pollution_threat FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY conservation_status ASC, species_name DESC;
